entry.title: Saltstack Vs Ansible From Deepseek
entry.summary: Both SaltStack (now often referred to as Salt) and Ansible are powerful configuration management and orchestration tools, and either can be a good choice for managing 30-50 servers. The â€œbestâ€ tool depends on your specific requirements, team expertise, and infrastructure. Below is a comparison to help you decide: Ease of Use Ansible: Uses YAML for playbooks, which are easy to read and wri...
